seo.title: DEM Properties | About the Agency – Real Estate Advisory in Marbella
seo.description: Discover DEM Properties, a boutique real estate advisory based in Marbella. Discretion, tailored guidance and carefully selected properties.

seo.ogTitle: DEM Properties – Boutique Real Estate Advisory
seo.ogDescription: A considered approach to real estate in Marbella. Tailored advisory, discretion and curated opportunities.

hero.subtitle: A boutique real estate agency in Marbella, dedicated to discretion, expertise and a deeply personal approach to property.
hero.signature: Est. 2019 — Boutique Real Estate in Marbella

localExpertise.title: Deeply rooted in Marbella
localExpertise.text: From the Golden Mile to Nueva Andalucía and the most discreet residential enclaves, we guide our clients through Marbella’s finest addresses with precision, local insight and a long-term understanding of value.

items.title: Listening Before Acting
items.text: Every project begins with understanding — your expectations, your timing and the life you intend to build around the property.

items.title: Precision Over Volume
items.text: We operate with focus and selectivity, analysing each opportunity with clarity, restraint and long-term perspective.

items.title: Measured Guidance
items.text: Our role is to advise, not to rush. We guide decisions with calm judgement, market insight and strategic distance.

preview.fallback_desc: Explore this exclusive property selected by our agency.

hero.quote: At DEM Properties, we take your privacy as seriously as your home. We are committed to absolute transparency in how we handle your personal data.

sidebar.contactDesc: If you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or how we handle your personal data, please reach out to our team.

collect.title: Information We Collect
collect.content: We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide through our website’s contact form. This may include First Name, Last Name, Phone Number, Email Address, and your specific message. Additionally, we use analytics tools to monitor website behavior to enhance our digital experience.

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.content: The information is used to respond to your inquiries, provide relevant information about our exclusive services, and improve the performance of our website. We will never sell, rent, or share your personal data with third parties for marketing purposes without your explicit consent.

protect.title: How We Protect Your Information
protect.content: We use industry-standard security measures to protect the personal information you provide. While no digital platform can guarantee total security, we are committed to ensuring the maximum confidentiality and integrity of your data.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data at any time. You may also opt out of receiving communications from us by clicking the unsubscribe link in our emails or by contacting us directly at d.elmoutii@demproperties.es.
